page.title: 02A HOUSE IN THE VALLEY
page.content: MY NAME IS SHARON HILL.I LIVE IN A SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE.THIS MEANS ONE SIDE OF THE HOUSE STANDS FREE,WHILE WE ARE JOINED IN THE MIDDLE TO ANOTHER HOUSE.IT IS A MODERNISED HOUSE WHICH HAS JUST BEEN REDECORATED.SIX PEOPLE LIVE IN MY HOUSE.THERE ARE THREE BEDROOMS ON THE UPSTAIRS FLOOR.DOWNSTAIRS THERE IS A BATHROOM,A LIVING ROOM,A PANTRY,A KITCHEN AND A PALOUR.IT IS A LARGE HOUSE AND I ENJOY LIVING THERE.WE WATCH TELEVISION IN THE LIVING ROOM.MY MOTHER COOKS IN THE KITCHEN,THIS IS ALSO WHERE WE EAT OUR MEALS.I HELP MY MOTHER IN THE KITCHEN BY WASHING THE DISHES.IN THE PANTRY WE KEEP OUR CUTLERY,AND OUR POTS AND PANS.ALTHOUGH MY HOUSE IS SEMI-DETACHED,MOST OF MY FRIENDS LIVE IN A TERRACED HOUSE.THESE ARE HOUSES ALL JOINED TOGETHER EXCEPT FOR THE END ONES.
